replaceTemplate.title: Replace one of your Rooms?
replaceTemplate.text:
Your plan allows you to use {{maxTemplates}} Rooms at the 
 same time
replaceTemplate.titleSecond:
Which one do you want 
 to replace?

manual.title: You downgraded subscription from {{prevPlan}} to {{currentPlan}}.
manual.text: On {{dueDate}}, the number of rooms you can use for free will be reduced from {{prevTemplatesNumber}} to {{currentTemplatesNumber}}. You will still be able to select another Room to replace the one you have

auto.title: Your subscription was downgraded from {{currentPlan}} to {{nextPlan}}
auto.text: The number of rooms you can use for free was reduced from {{currentTemplatesNumber}} to {{nextTemplatesNumber}}. You can still replace a room with another one
